name: Overall Ranking
query: SELECT CAST(s.unnest AS VARCHAR) AS id FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS r(unnest) CROSS JOIN UNNEST(r.unnest.scores) AS s(unnest)

name: Players Seen
query: SELECT CAST(s.unnest AS VARCHAR) AS id, COUNT(*) AS "Entries" FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS r(unnest) CROSS JOIN UNNEST(r.unnest.scores) AS s(unnest) GROUP BY id

name: Games Logged
query: SELECT CAST(r.unnest AS VARCHAR) AS id, COUNT(*) AS "Games" FROM results CROSS JOIN UNNEST(results.results) AS r(unnest) GROUP BY id
